doc: Fix transferrable shader cache deletion directory and filetype

Regarding #6585 being merged to Early Access, the "Remove Shader Cache" option has stopped working. I assume it is because of the change to how shaders are stored in a single, "vulkan.bin" or "opengl.bin" now as opposed to folders before this update.
It happens on both APIs, both OpenGL and Vulkan
And you are given this popup window showing "A shader cache for this title does not exist."
Hopefully this could be a quick fix, and if I knew where to look, I would probably try to do it myself XD
Hopefully I did everything right, as this was my first issue report here, but let me know if you need anything else
